statements: UPDATE user_profiles SET full_name = 'John Doe', date_of_birth = '1990-05-15' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'johndoe@example.com', address = '123 Main Street' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_profiles SET full_name='John Doe', address='123 Main St', date_of_birth='1990-05-15' WHERE user_id=100
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='johndoe@example.com', password='newpassword123', biometric_data=decode('01010101', 'hex') WHERE username='john_doe'
UPDATE user_profiles SET full_name = 'John Smith' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE account_information SET balance = 100.50 WHERE account_id = 100;
UPDATE user_profiles SET full_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE account_information SET account_type = 'savings', balance = 1000.50 WHERE account_id = 101;
UPDATE UserProfiles SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE AccountInformation SET balance=500.00 WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE UserProfiles SET username = 'john_doe', email = 'john_doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE AccountInformation SET balance = 5000.00, account_type = 'Savings' WHERE account_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', password='newpassword123' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE profiles SET full_name='John Doe', gender='Male' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE users SET username = 'john_doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE account_info SET balance = 500.00, last_transaction = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE account_number = '123456789';
UPDATE users SET bio_data = E'\x012345' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE account_info SET balance = 1000.00, account_type = 'Savings' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET username = 'JohnDoe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE account_info SET balance = balance + 1000.50 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
